languages.text: "Простор Коронус — дикое угодье, полное добычи. И Космические волки первыми окрасят его снега алым! Ярл решил отправить самых неукротимых охотников, жаждущих почестей и кровопролития. Где одна стая исполняла бы долг во имя чести, две уже стремились превзойти друг друга во имя славы".

"The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."
languages.original_text: "Простор Коронус — дикое угодье, полное добычи. И Космические волки первыми окрасят его снега алым! Ярл решил отправить самых неукротимых охотников, жаждущих почестей и кровопролития. Где одна стая исполняла бы долг во имя чести, две уже стремились превзойти друг друга во имя славы".

traits.locale_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The Jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for accolades and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of honour, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “科罗努斯扩区是一片充满猎物的荒野狩猎场，而太空野狼将用鲜血将皑皑白雪染红！领主决定派出最为坚韧的猎手，他们渴求荣耀与鲜血。如果只派出一支狼群，他们会为了荣耀而履行职责，但如果派出两支狼群的话……他们会为了荣耀，努力超越对手。”
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

traits.locale_text: “科罗努斯扩区是一片充满猎物的荒野狩猎场，而太空野狼将第一个将白雪用鲜血染红！领主决定派出最为坚韧的猎手，他们渴求荣耀与鲜血。如果只派出一支狼群，他们会为了荣耀而履行职责，但如果派出两支狼群的话……他们会为了荣耀，努力超越对手。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «La Extensión de Koronus es un terreno de caza salvaje con presa abundante. ¡Y los Lobos Espaciales seremos los primeros en teñir de rojo sus nieves! El Jarl decidió enviar a los cazadores más indomables, los que ansiamos honor y sangre. Una jauría habría cumplido su deber por orgullo, pero dos... Dos buscarán superarse mutuamente por la gloria».
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

traits.locale_text: «La Extensión de Koronus es un terreno de caza salvaje con presa abundante. ¡Y los Lobos Espaciales seremos los primeros en teñir de rojo sus nieves! El Jarl decidió enviar a los cazadores más indomables, los que ansiamos galardones y sangre. Una jauría habría cumplido su deber por honor, pero dos... Dos buscarán superarse mutuamente por la gloria».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスは獲物で溢れる野生の狩場だ。そしてスペースウルフは、その雪を緋色に染める最初の狩人となるのだ！ヤールは、名誉と流血を渇望する最も不屈の狩人たちを派遣することにした。群れが1つならば名誉のために義務を果たすだろうが、群れが2つならば…誇りのために互いを凌駕しようとするだろう」
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

traits.locale_text: 「コロヌス・エクスパンスは獲物で溢れる野生の狩場だ。そしてスペースウルフは、その雪を緋色に染める最初の狩人となるのだ！ヤールは、名誉と流血を渇望する最も不屈の狩人たちを派遣することにした。群れが1つならば名誉のために義務を果たすだろうが、群れが2つならば…誇りのために互いを凌駕しようとするだろう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Die Koronus-Ausdehnung ist ein wildes Jagdrevier, in dem es von Beute nur so wimmelt. Und die Space Wolves werden die Ersten sein, die seinen Schnee rot färben! Der Jarl hat entschieden, die unbezwingbarsten Jäger auszuschicken, die nach Ehre und Blutvergießen dürsten. Ein Rudel hätte seine Pflicht aus Stolz erfüllt, doch zwei ... zwei würden versuchen, einander um des Ruhms willen zu übertrumpfen."
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

traits.locale_text: "Die Koronus-Ausdehnung ist ein wildes Jagdrevier, in dem es von Beute nur so wimmelt. Und die Space Wolves werden die ersten sein, die ihren Schnee rot färbt! Der Jarl hat entschieden, die unbezwingbarsten Jäger auszuschicken, die nach Ruhm und Blutvergießen dürsten. Ein Rudel hätte seine Pflicht um der Ehre willen erfüllt, doch zwei ... zwei würden versuchen, einander um des Ruhms willen zu übertrumpfen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Les Étendues de Koronus sont un terrain de chasse sauvage qui pullule de proies. Et les Space Wolves seront les premiers à éclabousser sa neige immaculée d'un rouge profond ! Le jarl a décidé d'envoyer ses chasseurs les plus farouches, ceux qui ont soif d'honneur et de sang. Une meute aurait mené à bien cette mission par pure fierté, mais lorsqu'il y en a deux... chaque meute cherche à surpasser l'autre pour la gloire. »
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

traits.locale_text: « Les Étendues de Koronus sont un terrain de chasse sauvage qui pullule de proies. Et les Space Wolves seront les premiers à éclabousser sa neige immaculée d'un rouge profond ! Le jarl a décidé d'envoyer ses chasseurs les plus farouches, ceux qui ont soif de louanges et de sang. Une meute aurait mené à bien cette mission au nom de l'honneur, mais lorsqu'il y en a deux... chaque meute cherche à surpasser l'autre pour la gloire. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

languages.text: "Koronus Enginliği kurbanlarla dolu, vahşi bir av bölgesidir. Uzay Kurtları, karı kırmızıya ilk boyayanlar olacak! Yarl; en yenilmez, şan ve kana aç avcılarını gönderdi. Tek bir sürü, gurur için bu görevi yerine getirirdi ama iki sürü... Şan için birbirinden üstün olmaya çalışacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The Koronus Expanse is a wild hunting ground teeming with prey. And the Space Wolves will be the first to turn its snows scarlet! The jarl decided to send the most indomitable hunters who hunger for honour and bloodshed. One pack would have fulfilled its duty for the sake of pride, but two... two would seek to outdo each other for the sake of glory."

traits.locale_text: "Koronus Enginliği kurbanlarla dolu, vahşi bir av bölgesidir. Uzay Kurtları ise karları kırmızıya boyayan ilk kişiler olacak! Jarl, en yenilmez şan ve kana aç avcılarını gönderdi. Tek bir sürü, gurur için bu görevi yerine getirirdi ama iki sürü... Şan için birbirinden üstün olmaya çalışacaktır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
